name: The Crete Escape (polytely games, DaniM, Javier, Kapa, Plantiv Constructor, discolexia, Styxcolor, Little_Writer)
name_original: The Crete Escape (polytely games, DaniM, Javier, Kapa, Plantiv Constructor, discolexia, Styxcolor, Little_Writer)
description:
Adventure Ahead! Jazz musician Greta Goodnight plans herself a well-deserved vacation to the Greek island of Crete. Unfamiliar with its history and culture, a whole new world opens up to her, then swallows her whole as her peaceful vacation turns into an adventure from which there might be no escape!

In The Crete Escape, play as Greta Goodnight, a 40-something Jazz musician in dire need of the sun, wine and vacation in this hand-drawn point-and-click puzzle adventure game. Navigate through the strange lands of Crete, Greece, where things are not always as they seem.

Game was created in 14 days for $106 Adventure Game Challenge

Created with Visionaire Studio

- Use Left Click to walk around and interact with objects

- Please have fun
